src:
Atención afiliados
Pami cambia de lugar para autorizar órdenes

04 Nov 2019, 08:50

La Comisión Directiva del Círculo Médico informó a los afiliados de Pami Catamarca que a partir de este lunes la atención para autorización de órdenes de consulta y/o prácticas médicas se realizará en su nuevo local.
A partir de hoy, la atención a afiliados será en la Clínica de la Ciudad, ubicada en avenida Colón esquina avenida Sánchez Oviedo (a metros de la ex cárcel) de lunes a viernes de 7.30 a 12.30.
text:
Affiliate Attention
Pami changes places to authorize orders

04 Nov 2019, 08:50

The Board of Directors of the Medical Circle informed the members of Pami Catamarca that as of this Monday the attention for authorization of consultation orders and / or medical practices will be carried out in their new premises.
As of today, the attention to affiliates will be in the Clinic of the City, located in Avenida Colón corner Avenida Sánchez Oviedo (a few meters from the former prison) from Monday to Friday from 7.30 to 12.30.
